item.title: Tracking Stocks which could 2x in 1 to 3 years (Reddit Thread)
item.description: Came across this reddit post about asking for recommendations where the stock could go at least 2x in 1 to 3 years. I thought it would be interesting to track the recommendations and come back in 1 to 3 years and see how they perform. Link to Google Sheet: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ti14jCFZmWEzYf_FxkefI8v-NX-7Y_-_biZIXC5wO2g/edit?usp=sharing Here is the table with current prices: Symbol Name Current Price (Dec 2024) Price in 1 Year (Dec 2025) Price in 3 Years (Dec 2027) ACHR $8.
